org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.spi.data

Interface DOMStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DOMStoreTransactionFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedDataStore, InMemoryDOMDataStore

    public interface DOMStore
extends DOMStoreTransactionFactory
    DOM Data Store

    DOM Data Store provides transactional tree-like storage for YANG-modeled entities described by YANG schema and represented by NormalizedNode. Read and write access to stored data is provided only via transactions created using DOMStoreTransactionFactory.newReadOnlyTransaction(), DOMStoreTransactionFactory.newWriteOnlyTransaction() and DOMStoreTransactionFactory.newReadWriteTransaction(), or by creating TransactionChain.

    • Method Detail

      • registerChangeListener

        <L extends AsyncDataChangeListener<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.YangInstanceIdentifier,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.schema.NormalizedNode<?,?>>> org.opendaylight.yangtools.concepts.ListenerRegistration<L> registerChangeListener(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.YangInstanceIdentifier path,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          L listener,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          AsyncDataBroker.DataChangeScope scope)
        Registers DataChangeListener for Data Change callbacks which will be triggered on the change of provided subpath. What constitutes a change depends on the @scope parameter. Listener upon registration receives an initial callback AsyncDataChangeListener.onDataChanged(org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.common.api.data.AsyncDataChangeEvent) which contains stable view of data tree at the time of registration.  @param path Path (subtree identifier) on which client listener will be invoked.
        Parameters:
        listener - Instance of listener which should be invoked on
        scope - Scope of change which triggers callback.
        Returns:
        Listener Registration object, which client may use to close registration / interest on receiving data changes.

      • createTransactionChain

        DOMStoreTransactionChain createTransactionChain()
        Creates new transaction chain. Transactions in a chain need to be committed in sequence and each transaction should see the effects of previous transactions as if they happened. See DOMStoreTransactionChain for more information.
        Returns:
        Newly created transaction chain.
